Package io.atlasmap.spi

Interface AtlasCombineStrategy

All Known Implementing Classes:
DefaultAtlasCombineStrategy, TemplateCombineStrategy
@Deprecated public interface AtlasCombineStrategy
Deprecated.
COMBINE/SEPARATE mode has been deprecated. Use transformations with multiple field selection.
